trans-unit.source: Provides validation of a string based on the rules provided by a regular expression.
trans-unit.target: 对根据提供的正则表达式的规则对字符串进行验证。

trans-unit.source: The RegexStringValidator object contains the rules necessary to validate a string object based on a regular expression.
trans-unit.target: RegexStringValidator 对象包含验证基于正则表达式的字符串对象所需的规则。

trans-unit.source: The rules are established when an instance of the RegexStringValidator class is created.
trans-unit.target: 规则是创建 RegexStringValidator 类的实例时建立的。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.RegexStringValidator.CanValidate%2A> method determines whether the object type being validated matches the expected type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Configuration.RegexStringValidator.CanValidate%2A>方法确定正在验证的对象类型是否与预期的类型匹配。</xref:System.Configuration.RegexStringValidator.CanValidate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The object being validated is passed as a parameter of the <xref:System.Configuration.RegexStringValidator.Validate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 正在验证该对象被传递的参数<xref:System.Configuration.RegexStringValidator.Validate%2A>方法。</xref:System.Configuration.RegexStringValidator.Validate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Configuration.RegexStringValidator"></xref> class.
A string that specifies a regular expression.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，指定正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: regex is null or an empty string ("").
Determines whether the type of the object can be validated.
trans-unit.target: 确定是否可以验证的对象类型。

trans-unit.source: An exception is thrown if the validation fails.
trans-unit.target: 如果验证失败，将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: if the type parameter matches a string; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 如果 type 参数匹配的字符串; 否则为 。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the value of an object is valid.
trans-unit.target: 确定对象的值是否有效。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Configuration.RegexStringValidator> object contains the rules necessary to validate a string object based on a regular expression.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Configuration.RegexStringValidator>对象包含验证基于正则表达式的字符串对象所需的规则。</xref:System.Configuration.RegexStringValidator>

trans-unit.source: The rules are established when an instance of the <xref:System.Configuration.RegexStringValidator> class is created.
The string object to validate is passed as a parameter of the Validate method.
trans-unit.target: 要验证的字符串对象作为验证方法的一个参数传递。

trans-unit.source: value does not conform to the parameters of the class.
